template.description: In this template we get xml files from 10 years of hamshahry news agancy archive from 1997 to 2007 . xml fiile is converted to json by nifi spicific process group then json is passed to w keywordextracter service which returns a new json including keyword of title , finally the new json will be put in to elastic
